page.discussion: The .FLAGS_GET() method returns the index flags for the index referenced by the object pointer, . Flag is a string of characters. If the index is in descending order, Flag will include "D". If the index contains only unique key values, Flag will include "U".

section.title: Example
section.description: Finds the flags of the first tag in the production index file.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim tag as C dim indx as P dim flag as C tbl = table.current() tag = tbl.index_name_get(1) indx = tbl.index_primary_put(tag) flag = indx.flags_get()
